mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_restaurant_review ( restPk, writerPk, ctnt, eval ) VALUES ( #{restPk}, #{writerPk}, #{ctnt}, #{eval} )

INSERT INTO t_restaurant_review_img ( reviewPk, img ) VALUES
( #{item.reviewPk}, #{item.img} )
INSERT INTO t_board ( title, ctnt, writerPk ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{writerPk} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.restPk, A.reviewPk , B.reviewImgPk, B.img FROM t_restaurant_review A INNER JOIN t_restaurant_review_img B ON A.reviewPk = B.reviewImgPk WHERE A.restPk = #{restPk} ORDER BY B.reviewImgPk DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT A.reviewPk, A.restPk, A.ctnt, A.eval, A.regDt , A.writerPk, B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_restaurant_review A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.writerPk = B.userPk WHERE restPk = #{restPk}
